SEARCH
Package com.example.wizard_project.Controllers

Class WaitingListController

java.lang.Object
com.example.wizard_project.Controllers.WaitingListController
public class WaitingListController extends Object
WaitingListController manages interactions with the waiting list for events in Firestore.

  • Method Details

    • isUserOnWaitingList

      public void isUserOnWaitingList(String eventId, String userId, WaitingListController.OnCheckCompleteListener callback)
      Checks if a user is on the waiting list for the given event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      userId - The ID of the user.
      callback - The callback to handle success or failure.

    • addUserToWaitingList

      public void addUserToWaitingList(String eventId, User user, String userId, Double latitude, Double longitude, String status, WaitingListController.OnActionCompleteListener callback)
      Adds a user to the waiting list for the given event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      user - The user object to add.
      userId - The ID of the user.
      latitude - The latitude of the user's location.
      longitude - The longitude of the user's location.
      status - The user's event status (e.g., "Waitlisted", "Selected", etc).
      callback - The callback to handle success or failure.

    • removeUserFromWaitingList

      public void removeUserFromWaitingList(String eventId, String userId, WaitingListController.OnActionCompleteListener callback)
      Removes a user from the waiting list for the given event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      userId - The ID of the user to remove.
      callback - The callback to handle success or failure.

    • getEntrantLocations

      public void getEntrantLocations(String eventId, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<List<double[]>> onSuccess, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnFailureListener onFailure)
      Retrieves the locations of all entrants in the waiting list for a given event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      onSuccess - Callback invoked with a list of locations on success.
      onFailure - Callback invoked on failure.

    • updateUserStatus

      public void updateUserStatus(String eventId, String userId, String newStatus, WaitingListController.OnActionCompleteListener callback)
      Updates the status of a user in the waiting list for a specific event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event for which the user's status is being updated. Must not be null.
      userId - The ID of the user whose status needs to be updated. Must not be null.
      newStatus - The new status to set for the user (e.g., "Enrolled", "Cancelled"). Must not be null.
      callback - A callback to handle the result of the update operation, providing onSuccess or onFailure methods.

    • getUserStatus

      public void getUserStatus(String eventId, String userId, WaitingListController.OnStatusFetchedCallback callback)
      Retrieves the status of a user in the waiting list for a specific event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      userId - The ID of the user whose status is being retrieved.
      callback - The callback to handle the status or failure.
